channel.title: Legit-Pkz (Bring it back)
channel.description:
[b][left]Info[/left][/b] Hi, I am starting a development team because I think that we could bring the old RuneScape times. This server will be like an easier version of old runescape. I want to create an economy so that the game has meaning.
[u][b]Base[/b][/u]: Final Devolution 2.4
[u][b]Goal:[/b][/u] Bring back old RuneScape. Stabilize the server Stable economy Anti null, dupe and crash. Perfect non-combat skills (Combat skills are a lot better then any other servers)
[u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u] Adding now.
[u][b]Server Coders[/b][/u] - - - - -
[code] Name: Age: E-mail: Experience with java:
[/code]

item.title: Legit-Pkz (Bring it back)
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

[left]Info[/left]
Hi, I am starting a development team because I think that we could bring the old RuneScape times. This server will be like an easier version of old runescape. I want to create an economy so that the game has meaning.

Base: Final Devolution 2.4

Goal:
Bring back old RuneScape.
Stabilize the server
Stable economy
Anti null, dupe and crash.
Perfect non-combat skills (Combat skills are a lot better then any other servers)

Pictures:
Adding now.
